paper_abstract: We systematically identify a large class of substructural logics that satisfy the disjunction property (DP), and show that every consistent substructural logic with the DP is PSPACE-hard. Our results are obtained by using algebraic techniques. PSPACE-completeness for many of these logics is furthermore established by proof theoretic arguments. (c) 2011 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Disjunction property and complexity of substructural logics
